snippet.title: MARS 2120 - Release Date Reveal Trailer | Nintendo Switch, PS4, PS5, Xbox One/Series S|X and Steam
snippet.description:
Inspired by 1990s classics, QUByte's original metroidvania, MARS 2120, will be available to players on March 28, 2024, for Nintendo Switch, PS4, PS5, Xbox One, Xbox Series S|X, Steam, and the Epic Games Store. With stunning visuals, a balanced mix of melee and ranged combat, and a story filled with secrets, MARS 2120 promises an experience focused on exploration, discovery, and the use of Charlotte's various abilities, the game's protagonist.

#QUByteConnect2023
